data.title: Guangzhou Sanyu Hotel Reviews: 904 Verified Reviews Latest 2024
data.meta_description: Discover 904 Guangzhou Sanyu Hotel reviews, rated 4.5 by real travelers on Trip.com. Explore what previous guests loved about the hotel, including its services, amenities, location, rooms, and more!
data.text:
5.0/5

Outstanding

Posted on Mar 6, 2024

The service was very good. There was a handsome guy at the front desk who helped upgrade the room type (I'm sorry I forgot what I called himü•πü•π). The cleaning lady is also very diligent in replacing new supplies. Very good, very good. Manager, please look at me more!

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Thank you very much for your review! We will take your opinions seriously and feedback your needs to the relevant departments to ensure your satisfaction. Our front office has always attached great importance to guest satisfaction, and we will actively take measures to ensure that all guests can enjoy the best service. We attach great importance to the service quality and work efficiency of our employees to ensure that the hotel always maintains good hygiene and service quality. Thank you again for your review. We will continue to work hard to improve our service quality and provide you with a better experience!

5.0/5

Outstanding

Posted on Feb 21, 2024

fully equipped Hygiene: clean and tidy Environment: Noisy but quiet. The hotel has good greenery. Service: Xiaohui at the front desk has a very good service attitude. Likeüëçüèº

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Thank you very much for your guest's review. We will take it seriously and continuously improve our services and facilities to meet our guests' expectations and needs. The descriptions mentioned by guests such as complete facilities, clean and tidy environment, quiet environment in a noisy environment, and good greening of the hotel are all areas that we have been working hard to improve and improve. We will further strengthen staff training, improve service quality, and provide guests with a better stay experience. Thank you again for your support and encouragement. We will continue to work hard to provide you with the best service.

4.7/5

Amazing

Posted on Feb 17, 2024

The hotel environment is very good. I stayed for two nights, but the sound of mahjong playing was a bit loud when I went to bed on the second night, which affected my sleep. I stayed on the 14th floor. Maybe the 13th floor is a mahjong room, so I don't recommend staying on the 14th floor.

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Thank you very much for your review! As a hotel front office manager, I attach great importance to service quality and guest satisfaction. We will listen carefully to our guests' feedback and will do our best to provide you with better services. Thank you for your feedback. We will contact relevant departments to carry out relevant renovations in the chess and card room so as not to affect the rest of the guests. We look forward to providing you with better services!

5.0/5

Outstanding

Posted on Feb 15, 2024

The front desk service is good, give Xiao Hu a thumbs up üëç The room is nice, bright and comfortable, and the cleaning ladies are also very nice. The surrounding Dongshankou subway station is a trendy and lively area, and there is also the Xinhepu historical district, which is very quiet and very comfortable to walk around. The breakfast is more Chinese style, the dim sum variety is enough to fill you up, the replenishment is OK, and the taste is good. The bath water is big. The disadvantage is that the TV does not work and the network signal is not very good. Overall good value for money, satisfied!

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to leave your valuable review! Your complete satisfaction is our infinite motivation. There is no end point for our service, only the starting point! Pay attention to every detail and make Sanyu Hotel your warm harbor. This is the direction we have been working hard and improving! The hotel has recently launched the Furno Oxygen Executive Deep Sleep Room to provide you with a high-quality sleep experience. We warmly welcome you to experience your next stay.

5.0/5

Outstanding

Posted on Feb 15, 2024

The hotel is very close to the subway station and has convenient transportation. The hotel environment is good, with a large yard with convenient parking and good greenery. The room is clean and sanitary, and the breakfast is rich and delicious.

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Dear guest: Thank you for your comprehensive and detailed review! Thank you for choosing to stay at Sanyu Hotel. We have been committed to creating a first-class accommodation environment and high-quality service guarantee for guests. Let you stay at ease, at ease and comfortably. While strictly controlling the quality of hygiene, we are also constantly improving the hardware facilities. The hotel has recently launched the Funo Oxygen Executive Deep Sleep Room, which is spacious and bright, and is committed to providing you with a high-quality sleep experience. Welcome to stay and experience it next time.

4.5/5

Great

Posted on Feb 18, 2024

I like the environment here very much, it's very quiet, the service attitude is good, and the price is high.

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Dear guest: Thank you for your comprehensive and detailed review! Thank you for choosing to stay at Sanyu Hotel. We have been committed to creating a first-class accommodation environment and high-quality service guarantee for our guests. Let you live with peace of mind, peace of mind and comfort. While strictly controlling the hygiene quality, we are also constantly improving the hardware facilities. The hotel has recently launched the Furno Oxygen Executive Deep Sleep Room, which is spacious and bright. We are committed to providing you with a high-quality sleep experience. Welcome to your next stay.

3.7/5

Posted on Aug 11, 2024

The room was relatively large. During the Olympics, the TV was not working, but it was fixed later. The hot water was not hot enough after 11 pm. The bed was not clean enough and was a bit damp. The aunt who cleaned the room rolled up our pajamas and threw them on the bed after cleaning the bed. .

Original TextTranslated by Google

3.5/5

Posted on Jan 7, 2024

fully equipped, Health: OK, Environment: OK Service: Mineral water costs an extra 2 yuan for a bottle. It‚Äôs the first time you stay in a hotel and you are charged. It‚Äôs not user-friendly. Breakfast is not provided and you have to pay for it at your own expense. The overall experience is just average and I won‚Äôt come back next time!

Original TextTranslated by Google

Response from Property : Dear guest: Thank you very much for your review. We are very concerned about your evaluation of our hotel and thank you for your feedback. Each of our rooms is equipped with 2 bottles of mineral water. If the guest does not have enough water, they can contact our front desk staff and we will add mineral water for the guest. In addition, regarding breakfast, the hotel's external sales price does not include free breakfast (except for special promotions), and guests can choose according to their needs. We attach great importance to your evaluation and feedback, and we will continue to improve and perfect our services based on your suggestions and feedback. If you have any other questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us, we will serve you wholeheartedly.

4.7/5

Amazing

Posted on Jul 7, 2024

The service attitude is good, the room facilities are OK, relatively clean, the environment is elegant, and it is located in the central area, especially for business trips within two days. The waiter service is in place, I will stay here again next time I have the opportunity to travel on business

Original TextTranslated by Google
